content: Great read! I think a fundamental challenge will be ensuring these changes are minimal enough to not distort the user’s mental model of the application or website. If things continually change based on assumed interpretation, it could harm the user’s ability to recall the associated paradigms. Also, we would need a way to uniquely identify users without requiring them to actively identify themselves. Without this, it may be difficult for me to use my friends application, as the interface would be customized for them, and not usable by me :p.
